00048 typedef unsigned long data_type;
00049 static const data_type one = 1;
00050 static const data_type max_data = one << ( sizeof(data_type) - 1 );
00051 
00052 struct BooleanContainer;
00053 
00055 struct BoolVarRef_internal
00056 {
00057   static const BOOL isBool = true;
00058   static const BoundType isBoundConst = Bound_No;
00059   static string name() { return "Bool"; }
00060   BOOL isBound() const
00061   { return false;}
00062   
00063   data_type shift_offset;
00064   unsigned var_num;
00065   MoveablePointer data_position;
00066   MemOffset value_position;
00067 
00068   unsigned data_offset() const
00069   { return var_num / (sizeof(data_type)*8); }
00070   
00071 #ifdef MANY_VAR_CONTAINERS
00072   BooleanContainer* boolCon;
00073   BooleanContainer& getCon() const { return *boolCon; }
00074 
00075   BoolVarRef_internal(const BoolVarRef_internal& b) :
00076   shift_offset(b.shift_offset), var_num(b.var_num), data_position(b.data_position),
00077   value_position(b.value_position) ,boolCon(b.boolCon)
00078   { }
00079   
00080   BoolVarRef_internal() : shift_offset(~1), var_num(~1), boolCon(NULL)
00081   { }  
00082 #else
00083   static BooleanContainer& getCon_Static();
00084   BoolVarRef_internal(const BoolVarRef_internal& b) :
00085   shift_offset(b.shift_offset), var_num(b.var_num), data_position(b.data_position),
00086   value_position(b.value_position)
00087   { }
00088   
00089   BoolVarRef_internal() : shift_offset(~1), var_num(~1)
00090   { }
00091 #endif
00092   
00093   BoolVarRef_internal(int value, BooleanContainer* b_con);
00094   
00095   data_type& assign_ptr() const
00096   { return *static_cast<data_type*>(data_position.get_ptr()); }
00097   
00098   data_type& value_ptr() const
00099   { return *static_cast<data_type*>(value_position.get_ptr()); }
00100   
00101   BOOL isAssigned() const
00102   { return assign_ptr() & shift_offset; }
00103   
00104   DomainInt getAssignedValue() const
00105   {
00106     D_ASSERT(isAssigned());
00107     return (bool)(value_ptr() & shift_offset);
00108   }
00109   
00110   BOOL inDomain(DomainInt b) const
00111   {
00112     if((b|1) != 1)
00113       return false;
00114     return (!isAssigned()) || (b == getAssignedValue());
00115   }
00116   
00117   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(DomainInt b) const
00118   {
00119     D_ASSERT(b == 0 || b == 1);
00120     return (!isAssigned()) || (b == getAssignedValue());
00121   }
00122   
00123   DomainInt getMin() const
00124   {
00125     if(!isAssigned()) return 0;
00126     return getAssignedValue();
00127   }
00128   
00129   DomainInt getMax() const
00130   {
00131     if(!isAssigned()) return 1;
00132     return getAssignedValue();
00133   }
00134  
00135   DomainInt getInitialMin() const
00136   { return 0; }
00137   
00138   DomainInt getInitialMax() const
00139   { return 1; }
00140 
00141   DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt v) const 
00142   {
00143     D_ASSERT(inDomain(v));
00144     return v; 
00145   }
00146 
00147   Var getBaseVar() const { return Var(VAR_BOOL, var_num); }
00148  
00149   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const BoolVarRef_internal& b)
00150   { return o << "Bool:" << b.var_num; }
00151   
00152 };

00163 struct BooleanContainer
00164 {
00165   StateObj* stateObj;
00166   BooleanContainer(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj), var_count_m(0),  
00167                                           trigger_list(stateObj, false), lock_m(false)
00168   {}
00169   
00170   static const int width = 7;
00171   MoveablePointer assign_offset;
00172   MemOffset values_mem;
00173   vector<vector<AbstractConstraint*> > constraints;
00174 #ifdef WDEG
00175   vector<unsigned int> wdegs;
00176 #endif
00177   unsigned var_count_m;
00178   TriggerList trigger_list;
00180   BOOL lock_m;
00181   
00182   data_type* value_ptr()
00183   { return static_cast<data_type*>(values_mem.get_ptr()); }
00184   
00185   const data_type* value_ptr() const
00186   { return static_cast<const data_type*>(values_mem.get_ptr()); }
00187   
00188   data_type* assign_ptr()
00189   { return static_cast<data_type*>(assign_offset.get_ptr()); }
00190   
00191   const data_type* assign_ptr() const
00192   { return static_cast<const data_type*>(assign_offset.get_ptr()); }
00193   
00194   void lock()
00195   { 
00196    lock_m = true;
00197     // Min domain value = 0, max domain val = 1.
00198     trigger_list.lock(var_count_m, 0, 1);
00199   }
00200   
00202   //BoolVarRef get_new_var();
00203 
00204   void setVarCount(int bool_count)
00205   {
00206     D_ASSERT(!lock_m);
00207     var_count_m = bool_count;
00208 
00209     int required_mem = var_count_m / 8 + 1;
00210     // Round up to nearest data_type block
00211     required_mem += sizeof(data_type) - (required_mem % sizeof(data_type));
00212     assign_offset = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(required_mem);
00213     values_mem = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(required_mem);
00214     constraints.resize(bool_count);
00215 #ifdef WDEG
00216     if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on) wdegs.resize(bool_count);
00217 #endif
00218   }
00219   
00221   BoolVarRef get_var_num(int i);
00222   
00223   
00224   void setMax(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt i) 
00225   {
00226     if(i < 0)
00227     {
00228       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00229       return;
00230     }
00231 
00232     D_ASSERT(i >= 0);
00233     if(i==0)
00234       propagateAssign(d,0);
00235   }
00236   
00237   void setMin(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt i) 
00238   {
00239     if(i > 1)
00240     {
00241       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00242       return;
00243     }
00244     D_ASSERT(i <= 1);
00245     if(i==1)
00246       propagateAssign(d,1);
00247   }
00248   
00249   void removeFromDomain(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt b)
00250   {
00251     D_ASSERT(lock_m && d.var_num < var_count_m);
00252     if((b|1) != 1)
00253       return;
00254       
00255     if(d.isAssigned())
00256     {
00257       if(b == d.getAssignedValue()) 
00258         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00259     }
00260     else
00261       uncheckedAssign(d,1-b);
00262   }
00263 
00264   void internalAssign(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt b)
00265   {
00266     D_ASSERT(lock_m && d.var_num < var_count_m);
00267     D_ASSERT(!d.isAssigned());
00268     if((b|1) != 1)
00269     {
00270       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00271       return;
00272     }
00273     assign_ptr()[d.data_offset()] |= d.shift_offset;
00274     
00275     trigger_list.push_assign(d.var_num, b);
00276 #ifndef FEW_BOOLEAN_TRIGGERS
00277     trigger_list.push_domain_changed(d.var_num);
00278     trigger_list.push_domain_removal(d.var_num, 1 - b);
00279 #endif
00280     
00281     if(b == 1)
00282     {
00283       trigger_list.push_lower(d.var_num, 1);
00284       value_ptr()[d.data_offset()] |= d.shift_offset;
00285     }
00286     else
00287     {
00288       trigger_list.push_upper(d.var_num, 1);
00289       value_ptr()[d.data_offset()] &= ~d.shift_offset;
00290     }
00291   }
00292   
00293   void uncheckedAssign(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt b)
00294   { internalAssign(d, b); }
00295   
00296   void propagateAssign(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt b)
00297   {
00298     if(!d.isAssigned()) 
00299       internalAssign(d,b);
00300     else
00301     {
00302       if(d.getAssignedValue() != b)
00303     getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00304     }
00305   }
00306 
00307   void decisionAssign(const BoolVarRef_internal& d, DomainInt b)
00308   { internalAssign(d, b); }
00309 
00310   void addTrigger(BoolVarRef_internal& b, Trigger t, TrigType type)
00311   { 
00312     D_ASSERT(lock_m); 
00313 #ifdef FEW_BOOLEAN_TRIGGERS
00314     if(type == DomainChanged)
00315       type = Assigned;
00316     // Static triggers should never be of this type!
00317     D_ASSERT(type != DomainRemoval);
00318 #endif
00319     trigger_list.add_trigger(b.var_num, t, type); 
00320   }
00321     
00322   void addDynamicTrigger(BoolVarRef_internal& b, DynamicTrigger* t, TrigType type, DomainInt pos = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF)
00323   { 
00324     D_ASSERT(pos == NoDomainValue || ( type == DomainRemoval && pos != NoDomainValue ) );
00325     D_ASSERT(lock_m);
00326     
00327 #ifdef FEW_BOOLEAN_TRIGGERS
00328     TrigType new_type = type;
00329     switch(type)
00330     {
00331       case DomainChanged:
00332         new_type = Assigned; break;
00333       case DomainRemoval:
00334         if(pos == 0)
00335           new_type = LowerBound;
00336         else
00337           new_type = UpperBound;
00338     }
00339     pos = NoDomainValue;
00340 #endif    
00341     trigger_list.addDynamicTrigger(b.var_num, t, type, pos BT_CALL); 
00342   }
00343 
00344 
00345   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints(const BoolVarRef_internal& b)
00346   { return& constraints[b.var_num]; }
00347 
00348   void addConstraint(const BoolVarRef_internal& b, AbstractConstraint* c)
00349   { 
00350     constraints[b.var_num].push_back(c); 
00351 #ifdef WDEG
00352     if(getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on) wdegs[b.var_num] += c->getWdeg(); //add constraint score to base var wdeg
00353 #endif
00354   }
00355 
00356 #ifdef WDEG
00357   int getBaseWdeg(const BoolVarRef_internal& b)
00358   { return wdegs[b.var_num]; }
00359 
00360   void incWdeg(const BoolVarRef_internal& b)
00361   { wdegs[b.var_num]++; }
00362 #endif
00363 };
00364 
00365 inline BoolVarRef BooleanContainer::get_var_num(int i)
00366 {
00367   D_ASSERT(i < (int)var_count_m);
00368   return BoolVarRef(BoolVarRef_internal(i, this));
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline BoolVarRef_internal::BoolVarRef_internal(int value, BooleanContainer* b_con) : 
00372   var_num(value),  
00373   data_position(b_con->assign_offset, data_offset()*sizeof(data_type)),
00374   value_position(b_con->values_mem, data_offset()*sizeof(data_type))
00375 #ifdef MANY_VAR_CONTAINERS
00376 , boolCon(b_con)
00377 #endif
00378 { shift_offset = one << (value % (sizeof(data_type)*8)); }
00379 
00380 
00381 #endif
